meanings.definition: Being the only one of its kind
meanings.sent1: Her unique talent for painting set her apart from the other students.
meanings.sent2: The snowflake's unique shape made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent3: His unique way of tying shoelaces always made people smile.
meanings.sent4: The old bookstore had a unique charm that transported visitors to another time.
meanings.sent5: The unique aroma of freshly baked bread filled the entire neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Distinctive in a way that is not easily replicated
meanings.sent1: The artist's unique style of painting was instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent2: The antique clock had a unique design that couldn't be found anywhere else.
meanings.sent3: The unique pattern on the cat's fur made it look like a tiny tiger.
meanings.sent4: Her unique way of storytelling captivated audiences around the world.
meanings.sent5: The unique sound of the instrument echoed through the concert hall.

meanings.sent1: Finding a four-leaf clover is a unique occurrence.
meanings.sent2: The unique bird species was a rare sight in that area.
meanings.sent3: His unique choice of toppings on pizza always surprised his friends.
meanings.sent4: The unique gemstone sparkled like a rare treasure in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The unique plant species was discovered deep in the jungle.
